movies.Title: The Hobbit: the Battle of the Five Armies
Gangs of Wasseypur
movies.Description: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

movies.Title: Sin City
movies.Description: A film that explores the dark and miserable town, Basin City, and tells the story of three different people, all caught up in violent corruption.

movies.Title: Kind Hearts and Coronets
movies.Description: A distant poor relative of the Duke of D'Ascoyne plots to inherit the title by murdering the eight other heirs who stand ahead of him in the line of succession.

movies.Title: Song of the Sea
movies.Description: Ben, a young Irish boy, and his little sister Saoirse, a girl who can turn into a seal, go on an adventure to free the faeries and save the spirit world.
